prompts: Create an elegant ice-type Pokemon with multiple flowing tails and a mystical aura.
Show me a graceful creature resembling a fox, adorned with fluffy white fur and blue accents.
Generate a stunning Pokemon that embodies the beauty of ice and snow, with unique tail designs.
Design a magical ice-type Pokemon with shimmering fur and enchanting features, perfect for a snowy habitat.
Imagine a fox-like Pokemon that radiates icy elegance and has a serene demeanor.
Give me a mythical creature associated with winter, featuring beautiful tails and a calm presence.
Make a Pokemon that combines the charm of a fox with the coolness of ice, set in a mystical forest.
